title: SportsAI - Sports Betting Arbitrage Platform
short_description: Real-time sports betting arbitrage detection across 10+ sportsbooks. Find guaranteed profit opportunities instantly.
description:
Real-time detection and delivery of sports betting arbitrage opportunities across 10+ sportsbooks. When bookmakers disagree on odds, you win regardless of the outcome.

## Core Features

**Real-Time Arbitrage Detection**
- Scans 10+ sportsbooks continuously
- Sub-2-second latency for live events
- Supports 2-way, 3-way, and multi-way markets

**Intelligent Scoring**
Every opportunity is scored on:
- Profit margin (how much you will make)
- Bookmaker trust (reliability)
- Odds stability (how long it will last)
- Market liquidity (how much you can stake)

**AI-Powered Insights**
- Predictions and recommendations
- Pattern recognition
- Personalized alerts

**Credit System**
Built-in monetization with Winning Tips - high-confidence opportunities that users pay credits to unlock.

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React Native, TypeScript, TanStack Query, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, NestJS/Fastify, TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL, Redis
- APIs: The Odds API, API-Sports, TheSportsDB, OpenRouter AI

## What You Get
- Full source code (MIT License)
- 415/417 features implemented (99.5%)
- Deployment guides (Vercel + Render)
- 6 months of updates
requirements: Node.js 20+, PostgreSQL 16+, Redis, API keys for The Odds API
